snippet: Oumar Ould Hamaha, known for his red beard, his bloodthirsty statements to the media and his role in kidnapping a Canadian diplomat in 2008, was killed by French forces, the officials said.
abstract: Malian military officials say jihadist militant Oumar Ould Hamaha has been killed by French forces in Mali's desert north; Al Qaeda-linked Hamaha was known for his red beard, his bloodthirsty statements to the media and his role in kidnapping a Canadian diplomat in 2008.
lead_paragraph: Oumar Ould Hamaha, known for his red beard, his bloodthirsty statements to the media and his role in kidnapping a Canadian diplomat in 2008, was killed by French forces, the officials said.

headline.main: Leading Militant Killed in Mali, Military Officials Say
headline.print_headline: Mali: French Forces Kill a Top Militant, Officials Say
